title: Bug 13826Performance issue in Table.RemoveAll()
OB: Method org,eclipse.swt.widgets.Table.removeAll() removes items from thebeginning of a Vector, but it should remove the items from the end instead sinceVector is shuffling the items all around the place when removed from the top.This goes for the rest of places where all items are removed from a vector.
EB: Method org,eclipse.swt.widgets.Table.removeAll() removes items from thebeginning of a Vector, but it should remove the items from the end instead sinceVector is shuffling the items all around the place when removed from the top.This goes for the rest of places where all items are removed from a vector.
